bio: Everything you need to find/know about OP Chains.
impactDescription:
Problem Addressed:
The lack of centralized, curated information on OP Stack built blockchains was hindering the growth and understanding of the OPtimism community. OPChainList emerged as a solution to bridge this crucial information gap.

Beneficiaries:

New users seeking information about OP Stack built blockchains
Emerging OP Stack built blockchains in need of exposure and support
Existing OPtimism community members seeking a reliable resource to navigate the complex world of OP chains

Impact:

Tangible: 120 new users from 22 countries within a short time frame
Intangible: Strengthened community trust and knowledge sharing among OPtimists

Metrics:

20 OP blockchains listed
120 new users from 22 countries within the last 15 days
3 interviews conducted, fostering community engagement
contributionDescription:
OPChainList provides vital information on OP Stack built blockchains, serving all users regardless of blockchains' phase. Our dedication revolves around effectively introducing the community to all OP Stack built blockchains.

Key Features:
Inclusive listing of all OP Stack built blockchains
Safety measures through dedicated social media buttons, protecting the OPtimism community from potential scams
"Interviews" section providing insights into blockchain jobs like DevRel and promoting blockchain teams within the OPtimism community
"Apps" section customized for each blockchain page, fostering growth in emerging ecosystems

Accomplishments:
20 OP blockchains listed
Attracted 120 new users from 22 countries, including the USA, UAE, Turkey, France, Nigeria, Canada, within the last 15 days.

contributionLinks.description: Mode Interview (we have 3 interviews at the moment)
Safety buttons for every blockchains, preventing scams

impactMetrics.description: Everyday we are gaining 4-5 new users

reportReason: This seems like something quickly put together to receive RetroPGF
